name: Stephanie
description:
Navigate the world of social distancing in the times of COVID-19 as a person dealing with the stresses of their new life.

Gameplay Trailer Video: 



Software Used:

  • Unreal
  • Maya
  • Substance Designer & Painter
  • LMMS
  • Audacity

References:

  • GOOD SKY by UNEASY - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/good-sky
  • PBS News - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/show/brazils-people-fear-a-covid-19-threat-their-president-denies
  • CDC Daily Life and Coping - https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/daily-life-coping/index.html
